title: #171: Interviewing Alison Sweeney of The Chronicle Mysteries
description:
Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti interview Alison Sweeney about her new Hallmark Movies and Mysteries series The Chronicle Mysteries and the first movie, Recovered, which premieres on February 17. Alison shares some behind the scenes secrets about what inspired her to develop the series where she plays a true crime podcaster, Alex Mcpherson. 


In the first movie Alex goes back to her old hometown town in Pennsylvania to re-investigate the disappearance of her childhood friend Gina DeSavio using her podcast, Recovered. 



Follow Alison on Instagram @AliSweeney

Follow the series @chroniclemysteries
